unnormalised: Yeah, I had a terrible experience. They delivered my parcel to the wrong address, like H.No. 23 instead of H.No. 32, Sector 17, Chandigarh, 160017. It took me a week and multiple calls to their customer care to get it back!
normalised: Yeah, I had a terrible experience. They delivered my parcel to the wrong address, like House Number twenty three instead of House Number thirty two, Sector seventeen, Chandigarh, one six zero zero one seven. It took me a week and multiple calls to their customer care to get it back!
